name: Shaped
headline: The fastest path to relevant recommendations and search
description: Increase engagement, conversion, and revenue with a configurable search and recommendation system that adapts in real-time.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:machine-learning; industry:api; industry:search; industry:recommendation-system; location:new-york

founders.name: Tullie Murrell, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
CEO of Shaped. 
Previously an AI researcher at Facebook AI Research (FAIR).
Creator of PyTorchVideo & original core contributor to PyTorch Lightning.
Passionate about anything AI, machine-learning and statistics.

founders.name: Daniel Camilleri, Founder
founders.description:
COO of Shaped. 
Previously head of product research at Afterpay and lead UXR at Uber. 
Passionate about behavioural economics, statistics and design.

# Build GenAI Search & Recommendations 100x Faster
Increase engagement, conversion, and retention with a configurable system that adapts in real-time
[Get a Demo](https://shaped.ai/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/matt2900/meet-with-shaped-?uuid=4076ed73-5725-4ee7-ac01-2e1869237a18>)[Try for free](https://shaped.ai/<https:/dashboard.shaped.ai/register>)

## Why Shaped
Turn behavior into relevance
  * ### Easy Set-Up
Connect and deploy rapidly with direct integration to your existing data sources.
![Diagram showing how you can connect and deploy rapidly with direct integration to your existing data sources.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668c2c51c9deca1046d67070/669699e2af7c8f6d89f28d97_why-shaped-mob-01.webp)
  * ### Real-Time Adaptability
Ingest and re-rank in real-time using behavioral signals.
  * ### State-of-the-Art Model Library
Fine tune LLMs and neural ranking models for state-of-the-art performance.
![diagram talking about fine tune LLMs and neural ranking models for state-of-the-art performance.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668c2c51c9deca1046d67070/669699e28cc8867334df620b_why-shaped-mob-03.webp)
  * ### Highly Customizable
Build and experiment with ranking and retrieval components for any use case.
![diagram describing 'Build and experiment with ranking and retrieval components for any use case' feature](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668c2c51c9deca1046d67070/669699e21b514e1adbe422cd_why-shaped-mob-04.webp)
  * ### Explainable Results
Visualize, evaluate, and interpret your data with in-session analytics and performance metrics.
![diagram describing 'Visualize, evaluate, and interpret your data with in-session analytics and performance metrics' feature](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668c2c51c9deca1046d67070/669699e2b15409f35ecf40c0_why-shaped-mob-05.webp)
  * ### Secure Infrastructure
Scale with enterprise-grade security that’s GDPR and SOC2 compliant.
![diagram describing 'Scale with enterprise-grade security that’s GDPR and SOC2 compliant' feature](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668c2c51c9deca1046d67070/669699e20e0f770382d43d5b_why-shaped-mob-06.webp)


![Diagram showing how you can connect and deploy rapidly with direct integration to your existing data sources.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668c2c51c9deca1046d67070/669034fb9ace042cde50b1ae_shaped-why-01.webp)
![diagram talking about fine tune LLMs and neural ranking models for state-of-the-art performance.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668c2c51c9deca1046d67070/669034fc8e18bca0d3318ec7_shaped-why-03.webp)
![diagram describing 'Build and experiment with ranking and retrieval components for any use case' feature](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668c2c51c9deca1046d67070/66967f16558f0ded5786f149_shaped-why-04.webp)
![diagram describing 'Visualize, evaluate, and interpret your data with in-session analytics and performance metrics' feature](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668c2c51c9deca1046d67070/66967fc43a5c121bfc9ca95d_shaped-why-04.webp)
![diagram describing 'Scale with enterprise-grade security that’s GDPR and SOC2 compliant' feature](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668c2c51c9deca1046d67070/669a7dd215fdfa2f882a7553_shaped-why-06.webp)

# Get up and running with one engineer in one sprint
Guaranteed lift within your first 30 days or your money back
[Get a Demo](https://shaped.ai/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/matt2900/meet-with-shaped-?uuid=4076ed73-5725-4ee7-ac01-2e1869237a18>)
100M+
Users and items
1000+
Queries per second
1B+
Requests
## FAQs
Wherever you need us, we’re there. We are always on-hand to answer your questions.
[Contact](https://shaped.ai/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/matt2900/meet-with-shaped-?uuid=4076ed73-5725-4ee7-ac01-2e1869237a18>)
How long will it take to integrate?
The integration process is quick. You can connect your data to Shaped in minutes, train your first model in hours, and fully integrate into your app in days.
How is Shaped different to Algolia, AWS Personalize...?
Prior to discovering Shaped many of our customers were using Algolia or AWS Personalize. To learn why they switched you can browse a short summary below, read a [case study](https://shaped.ai/<https:/www.shaped.ai/case-study/supergreat>) describing the challenges they faced or simply know that we have in many cases _doubled_ the performance of these products. ‍**1. Multi-modal unstructured data understanding** Shaped uses state-of-the-art AI technologies like transformers and Large Language Models (LLMs) to make complex data types, including text, images, and video, usable for ranking systems. Using all types of your data significantly improves ranking performance. Algolia and AWS Personalize don't support unstructured data understanding.**2. Built for data scientists and ML engineers** Shaped connects directly to all of your data warehouses and application stores. This means no extra work for you and instant deployment via our CLI. In contrast, Algolia and AWS Personalize require manual transformations and for you to push your data. This adds extra work for the initial setup and ongoing maintenance.**3. Real-time ranking systems** Shaped specializes in real-time ranking systems. This means you can easily use ranking in dozens of places throughout your company, products and apps. Algolia primarily focuses on search, while AWS Personalize offers a batch based recommendation system.**4. White-glove support** We’re as hands on as you’d like us to be with your data, offering advice and helping you build your models.‍For more information see these blog posts comparing [Shaped with Algolia](https://shaped.ai/<https:/www.shaped.ai/blog/shaped-vs-algolia-recommend>) and [Shaped with AWS personalize.](https://shaped.ai/<https:/www.shaped.ai/blog/shaped-vs-aws-personalize>)
Can I use Shaped for multiple ranking use-cases?
Certainly! Shaped is designed to be used for all of your ranking use-cases. Typically the companies we work with deploy dozens. Once your data is connected to Shaped creating additional ranking models is easy. See our docs for more information.
How much data do I need?
There is no minimum amount of data required. Collecting interactions, for example clicks, views and or impressions is the only requirement.‍For more information see this blog post [How much data do I need for a recommendation system?](https://shaped.ai/<https:/www.shaped.ai/blog/how-much-data-do-i-need-for-a-recommendation-system>)
Why shouldn’t I build this in-house?
The high cost of hiring multiple machine-learning engineers, the long time required to build and the on-going full-time maintenance required. We handle scalability and reliability without the worries. Shaped can take you from 0 to 1 in a few days at a fraction of the cost.
What’s your pricing?
Our pricing is flat-fee monthly determined by usage. Once we understand your approximate number of monthly active users, items counts, and particular implementation details, we’ll be able to provide a pricing estimate.
How do you handle my data?
Shaped was built from the ground-up with security as a top priority. We operate as a cloud software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform, and only retrieve from your connected datastores when necessary to build your ranking algorithms. After training, most of your data is discarded, other than specific non-identifiable encoded features that are used at inference. We only require read access to your datasets and customer data never has to be persisted within Shaped. Furthermore, Shaped works on encrypted data if you need an added layer of security.Shaped uses best physical, virtual, network and operational security practices. We rely on role-based authentication for all data access and records audit logs for every action. We avoid data replication and have clear multi-tenant isolation policies to ensure sensitive and critical systems are separated. Shaped uses isolated VPCs for all production deployments. Data is encrypted at rest using AES-256 encryption or higher and all ingress and egress traffic is encrypted via TLS 1.2+. For more information see [here.](https://shaped.ai/<https:/docs.shaped.ai/docs/support/security>)

## FAQs
Wherever you need us, we’re there. We are always on-hand to answer your questions.
Contact⟨12⟩
How long will it take to integrate?
The integration process is quick. You can connect your data to Shaped in minutes, train your first model in hours, and fully integrate into your app in days.
How is Shaped different to Algolia, AWS Personalize...?
Prior to discovering Shaped many of our customers were using Algolia or AWS Personalize. To learn why they switched you can browse a short summary below, read a case study⟨70⟩ describing the challenges they faced or simply know that we have in many cases _doubled_ the performance of these products. ‍**1. Multi-modal unstructured data understanding** Shaped uses state-of-the-art AI technologies like transformers and Large Language Models (LLMs) to make complex data types, including text, images, and video, usable for ranking systems. Using all types of your data significantly improves ranking performance. Algolia and AWS Personalize don't support unstructured data understanding.**2. Built for data scientists and ML engineers** Shaped connects directly to all of your data warehouses and application stores. This means no extra work for you and instant deployment via our CLI. In contrast, Algolia and AWS Personalize require manual transformations and for you to push your data. This adds extra work for the initial setup and ongoing maintenance.**3. Real-time ranking systems** Shaped specializes in real-time ranking systems. This means you can easily use ranking in dozens of places throughout your company, products and apps. Algolia primarily focuses on search, while AWS Personalize offers a batch based recommendation system.**4. White-glove support** We’re as hands on as you’d like us to be with your data, offering advice and helping you build your models.‍For more information see these blog posts comparing Shaped with Algolia⟨71⟩ and Shaped with AWS personalize.⟨72⟩
Can I use Shaped for multiple ranking use-cases?
Certainly! Shaped is designed to be used for all of your ranking use-cases. Typically the companies we work with deploy dozens. Once your data is connected to Shaped creating additional ranking models is easy. See our docs for more information.
How much data do I need?
There is no minimum amount of data required. Collecting interactions, for example clicks, views and or impressions is the only requirement.‍For more information see this blog post How much data do I need for a recommendation system?⟨73⟩
Why shouldn’t I build this in-house?
The high cost of hiring multiple machine-learning engineers, the long time required to build and the on-going full-time maintenance required. We handle scalability and reliability without the worries. Shaped can take you from 0 to 1 in a few days at a fraction of the cost.
What’s your pricing?
Our pricing is flat-fee monthly determined by usage. Once we understand your approximate number of monthly active users, items counts, and particular implementation details, we’ll be able to provide a pricing estimate.
How do you handle my data?
Shaped was built from the ground-up with security as a top priority. We operate as a cloud software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform, and only retrieve from your connected datastores when necessary to build your ranking algorithms. After training, most of your data is discarded, other than specific non-identifiable encoded features that are used at inference. We only require read access to your datasets and customer data never has to be persisted within Shaped. Furthermore, Shaped works on encrypted data if you need an added layer of security.Shaped uses best physical, virtual, network and operational security practices. We rely on role-based authentication for all data access and records audit logs for every action. We avoid data replication and have clear multi-tenant isolation policies to ensure sensitive and critical systems are separated. Shaped uses isolated VPCs for all production deployments. Data is encrypted at rest using AES-256 encryption or higher and all ingress and egress traffic is encrypted via TLS 1.2+. For more information see here.⟨74⟩

generated_description:
**Shaped: Your Partner in Real-Time Recommendations**

Founded in 2021 and located in New York, Shaped is on a mission to enhance the way users receive recommendations and navigate searches online. At its core, Shaped offers a configurable search and recommendation system designed to boost engagement, conversion rates, and revenue for businesses of all sizes. With a team of 12 and backers like Y Combinator (Batch W22), Shaped is quickly establishing itself as a leader in the AI-driven recommendation space.

**What Does Shaped Do?**

Shaped provides tools that allow businesses to seamlessly integrate sophisticated search and recommendation functionalities into their existing workflow. Their system adapts in real-time, meaning that as user behavior changes, so too do the recommendations and search results. This adaptability translates into higher engagement and better user experiences across platforms, whether it’s a marketplace, e-commerce site, or media platform.

Their product offerings include:
- **Semantic Search**: Making search results more relevant by understanding user intent better.
- **Recommendations**: Tailoring suggestions based on user behavior and preferences.
- **Analytics**: Providing insights into user interactions and system performance.

**Why Choose Shaped?**

1. **Easy Integration**: Businesses can connect to Shaped rapidly without extensive overhauls of their existing data systems.
2. **Real-Time Adaptability**: The platform utilizes behavioral signals to adjust recommendations dynamically.
3. **Advanced Technology**: Shaped makes use of Large Language Models (LLMs) for nuanced understanding of unstructured data.
4. **Customization**: Users can create and test various ranking models tailored to their specific needs.
5. **Security**: With enterprise-grade security measures, including GDPR and SOC2 compliance, Shaped is designed with data privacy in mind.

Shaped has built a platform that caters not just to developers but also to data scientists and data engineers, ensuring that everyone can benefit from its capabilities.

**Proven Impact**

Shaped boasts impressive metrics:
- Over 100 million users and items processed.
- Capable of handling over 1,000 queries per second.
- In some implementations, clients have seen up to a 4x increase in redemption rates and a 16% lift in average order value.

So if you’re looking to fundamentally change how your users interact with your digital spaces, consider Shaped. With their innovative approach to AI-driven recommendations and a proven track record of success, they may just be the partner you need to elevate your platform’s performance.

You can learn more or request a demo through their [website](https://shaped.ai).
